Reviews.Title: battery life is AWESOME
Reviews.Author: Jady
Reviews.Content: ok, i've had this phone for about a year and a half and its still in decent shape. i don't treat my phones well i constantly drop them that is why i couldn't get a delicate phone and is why this phone is perfect. no matter how many times you drop it it won't get serious damage. The battery life of this phone is amazing. One bar can last you two days and no bars can last you a full day and this is only txting and making two or three calls. But i will tell you its now starting to act up a little but now a days phones start to have problems usually around this time so that you can waste money on buying a new phone by upgrading with a new 2year contract. But i would most definitely recommend for those who love to text.

Reviews.Title: Not very sexy but quite dependable
Reviews.Author: Man o 'tides
Reviews.Content: Got the Samsung Gravity T459 almost 3 years ago and it has served me well.Not glamorous by Iphone, Android, Blackberry standards but, then, I don't need nor do I have to pay for a bunch of expensive fees and uneeded bells and whistles associated with those phones.Starting with the design I like the grey/lime exterior.  It's a candy bar  with a convenient QWERTY slide out keyboard.  That was the feature that attracted me to this phone.  Prior to this Samsung I had a Motorola Razer flip phone which had its good points but was awkward as far as texting goes with my big hands.It was about then that I discovered that my grandkids will respond to my text messages faster than phone calls and voice mails.  So I wanted a phone with better texting features.  Once I got used to the keyboard i found texting was much easier on this Gravity.I can remember doing some research on the T 459 prior to purchase and remember how a CNet reviewer claimed the phone had poor audio quality.  I went ahead and bought a 2 year contract with T-Mobile which included the Gravity saying to myself no phone is perfect and waited for the heretofore described poor quality sound to show up.  It never did.  Maybe the CNet person got a bad phone or lived in a canyon or something anyway I always get clear , undistorted, reception.And rarely do I have a dropped call.Speaking of dropping..this phone has been dropped a few times and came up unphased.  It's pretty ruggedly  built  so seems able to take a lot of punishment.It has a very unimpressive 1.3 pixel camera which comes in handy occasionally.  If I take pictures I prefer my Canon powershot anyway.Has bluetooth, which I never use.So, you can see its kind of down and dirty meat and potatoes kinda phone that gets the job done.  All I care about is calling and receiving calls, voice mail, caller ID and not much more.I just went with T-Mobile's pay as you go plan.  Because the Gravity is a GSM unlocked phone I was able to keep  my phone number and original SIM card with  all my contacts and such and didn't have to purchase another phone.  Very cool.So..yeah...I have been well pleased with Samsung Gravity...it works.

Reviews.Title: A PHONE THAT SERVES THE PURPOSE
Reviews.Author: Benokafor
Reviews.Content: For those looking for a phone that serves the purpose of talking and texting, this is the one. It is dependable, to easy to carry but with great output. The only problem is that the battery lasts for about two hours.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Rose
Reviews.Content: I love this phone! My brother bought it for me, and it's great. Texting is easy, using the IM is easy, and the speaker quality is fine. It doesn't have a super-quality camera though...if there's not a lot of light, pics might come out dark. Beyond that, it's definitely worth having.

Reviews.Title: Don't Buy This Phone!!
Reviews.Author: Ann
Reviews.Content: I have owned many Samsung phones and never had a problem with reception. But this "New" phone has the worst reception ever.  I can barely get a signal, Calls are dropped, always says "searching". When I have a bar and try to text , it won't go thru in many area's. I had my son stand next to me with his Samsung TM 506 phone and it has full reception, yet the T459 has none??  After researching the T459 phone, I found many other people had poor reception with it. Therefore it seems to be a problem with this model. Don't waste your money on this phone. I ended up returning this phone.

Reviews.Title: Really durable phone!
Reviews.Author: Bergen
Reviews.Content: This phone is really good for people who don't treat their phones too well, i drop my phone all the time, mainly cause i like to play around with it in the air haha. The battery life for this phone is pretty good, i've had it about 2 years now and im on my second battery, the first died because of water, but this one is holding up pretty well, texting all day long the battery lasts, with a full charge it lasts only about a day and a half, but thats because i text all day long and i'm generally on it so there is a constant battery drain there. Overall i really like this phone because of its durability (getting a phone case is a really good idea too btw) and its overall easy access.

Reviews.Title: Don't get this phone if you're expecting picture messaging or IM capabilities.
Reviews.Author: Margot
Reviews.Content: Since this is an "unlocked" phone and you're not getting standard firmware, ("Chatr" firmware), don't expect to have the same functions or applications as the normal Samsung Gravity. Let me be clear, you CANNOT send picture messages and there is no way to use Instant Message services such as AIM, MSN, ICQ, or whatever with this phone. Pretty uncool, that's one of the reasons I -bought- this phone. It's supposed to.I guess that's why it doesn't come with a user manual.

Reviews.Title: VERY GOOD - as a spare/second phone!!
Reviews.Author: L. Kokko
Reviews.Content: I got this phone for myself last week from a friend. It has a decent camera and it DOES has bluetooth. I would get this phone as a spare or a second phone if you need one. It has a nice full slide out keyboard and very easy to navigate through. The color is pretty cool and not a plain solid color. The power on and power off are fairly quick!! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND AS A SPARE PHONE!

Reviews.Title: great phone at a reasonable price!
Reviews.Author: Marsha Silagy
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone because I dropped the one similar to this model in water.  There was a specific feature I was looking for and that was an alert tone that will continually repeat the alert every minute for texts and voice mails.  That's important to me because I don't have to look at my phone all the time if I'm out of hearing range.  The keys on the phone for texting are much easier to press than my previous phone that costs over twice as  much from TMobile.  The keys are a bit rounded which makes pressing them easier.  Also this phone has to be manually locked by pressing the star button so if you don't want it locked it isn't automatic.  For me that was a plus.  This is an easy phone to use and text with, not for people who want all the features of an IPhone, but for someone that doesn't need the internet on their phone.  A great value!

Reviews.Title: Solid
Reviews.Author: pcyh
Reviews.Content: Solid phone, for $59 which is what I bought it for @ Fry's.Not the lightest or sleekest or coolest phone, but it has some good basic functions.Sadly at Fry's the box only comes with the phone and the charger, and that's it. No USB cable, no warranty, no instruction manuals etc. But that's Fry's problem.Pros: easy to use, the slider keyboard that opens sideways, decent camera, mp3 usageCons: Slow startup time - 11 seconds almost - a bit heavy and not the most fashionable. Also the battery life is a little less than some other phones of its kind - about a little over a day and the battery is getting low.I'm not the fancy smart-phone type of person so this phone is quite alright for me. Bought it go to Europe with, it is a GSM quad-band phone. I may do another review when I get back from Europe and see if it still holds the 4 stars for me.

Reviews.Title: Great phone.
Reviews.Author: kb
Reviews.Content: Needed a phone for my nephew that wasn't a data plan, but had a keypad for texting. This was recommended and he loves it.

Reviews.Title: back up phone
Reviews.Author: Michael Madayag
Reviews.Content: got my grandmother a back up phone works good, speaker phone sucks, and internal antenna seems kinda weak. does its job as a back up though

Reviews.Title: Disappointing
Reviews.Author: Therese Lauritzen
Reviews.Content: Even though it was described as 'Like new' it was in horrible shape. It was scratched  and banged up. Even the battery was scratched up which makes me think it was dropped quite a bit and the battery went sliding . I am very unhappy and disappointed with this purchase. I am not sure how long the phone will keep working considering the shape it came in.

Reviews.Title: Fido  (T456) NOT Gravity (T459)
Reviews.Author: OnEutawStreet
Reviews.Content: In purchasing in this product, I do not think I realized that I was getting a phone that has a few major differences that what I was trying to replace.  The description says T456/T459.  I already owned a T459 Samsung Gravity that is a simple phone that does what I need it to do (until it was dropped in a puddle during a major rainstorm).  I am not concerned about internet connectivity, touch screen or apps.  The Gravity has a QWERTY keyboard that slides out that I use for texting.  It also has functionality compatability with T-Mobile that saves all phone numbers to T-Mobile Servers as a back-up.  What I received was a T456 Samsung Fido (appears to be for Rogers network in Canada).  It has the same QWERTY keyboard that slides out.  The shell is generally the same (exact same color scheme as my Gravity).  The phone is compatable with T-mobile, but I have had the most difficult time getting my old phone numbers across on my old SIM card.  Did not thik this would be an issue with the push/pull of the addressbook from T-mobile servers, however the T456 DOES NOT HAVE THIS FUNCTIONALITY.  If I had multilpe phone numbers on the Gravity for a contact, only the cellphone numbers made it to the T456, not land line/home or office.There are some other functionality differences in terms of how to get to a certain function, but otherwise similar to my Gravity.

Reviews.Title: not happy with the phone
Reviews.Author: Michael Depalma
Reviews.Content: i bought this phone about 3 weeks ago the phone was delievered late and i cant send picture messages the phone keeps shuting off when i go to use it....i also cant set any ringtones that i have on my memory card i am so unhappy with the phone :(.

Reviews.Title: gt it
Reviews.Author: xL0vexLess
Reviews.Content: just got itnothing i don't like about it yetexcept i had to order a 2GB micro memory cardit messed up my 8gb and i had to reformat it

Reviews.Title: Garbage
Reviews.Author: monstermom "G.M."
Reviews.Content: This phone has good features, but kept getting dropped calls. I've had tmobile for years and never the issue of out of network has arised. With this phone, I had dropped calls between 430 and 730. ONLY with calls, texts went through. And now it's been 10 months and the phone has died. I never abused the phone, took care of it. Now it's useless. And friends that have this phone also say is a waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Don't get this phone!
Reviews.Author: Corno di Bassetto
Reviews.Content: I got this phone as an "upgrade" from my t-mobile account. It worked fine for a few months. Now every time I get it out of it's holster in attempt to answer it, it hangs up and automatically goes to voice-mail. Naturally when I went into the t-mobile store it worked fine. Needless to say I really feel like I've been screwed by getting this phone.

Reviews.Title: Pros/Cons
Reviews.Author: Nancela
Reviews.Content: The product didn't work. On the positive side, they sent it to me really quickly. I'll see how the exchange process proceeds. They responded quickly to the exchange email, as well.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Gravity T456/t459 not worth having
Reviews.Author: Neressa N Poole
Reviews.Content: This phone is definitely not what I expected there is not a lot I'm able to do with it. I know it's not an android phone, nor a smart phone, that I did know when I purchased it. But now because of this phone, looks Like I'm going to have to upgrade. I can't even get on the internet with this phone, nor can I send pics. and that's not good at all.

Reviews.Title: Did not even work for a year
Reviews.Author: jojo2525
Reviews.Content: I loved this phone with the features but was very disappointed in the fact it did not even last a year. I started getting scrammbled screens, I would quit using for a few weeks then it would work fine for awhile, I just got it back out this week and within the day it was acting up. This was the first phone I ever paid for and was very disappointed. When it started acting up I bought a less expensive Samsung phone and it stinks too. Would not recommend any Samsung phone at this time.

Reviews.Title: Out of Date
Reviews.Author: J. C. Davis
Reviews.Content: I'm sure this phone was great in its day, but it's out of date by now. I bought one, and, probably because it was so old, the screen died within six weeks. If you're strapped for cash, go to Target and buy a TMOBILE prepaid phone that ranges from 30 to 80 dollars, put your SIM card in it, and it will work. I have done this numerous times. I have the 80 dollar one. It is a texting phone similar to the new Gravity, and I am very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Too much money, too few perks
Reviews.Author: Lisa "I'm all about  the romance. I like the ...
Reviews.Content: For this price, this phone should be nicer. I had no idea that I was paying this much for a phone this far in the stoneage. I could have gone to a local thrift shop and paid next to nothing for this phone. Needless to say, next time I will research the phone more before I buy another one.

Reviews.Title: AWFUL EXPERINCE WITH A REAL CLIENT!!!!
Reviews.Author: GEOVANNY
Reviews.Content: I have more than a week without any answer from the seller, I might think he don't care their clients and my phone is an used unit because when I turn the phone on many contacts and other information where in the memory.I supposed is a new phone. why I found all these information in my daughter OLD all new TELEPHONE?Thanks for a very awful experince I will never buy again to THE OEM SHOP AGAIN.You have loose 1 client and my Trust to you company.Geovanny Monge- Fort Laudardale- Miami

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: ghost
Reviews.Content: it is the best phone i had my old one broke so i had to get a new one which is the same as my old one but diffrent color but it is an outstanding phone cant wait till it comes

Reviews.Title: Disappointed!
Reviews.Author: ben
Reviews.Content: Has to be the worst product I have purchased from Amazon! The ease of texting is amazing!!! Although, the phone doesn't hold a charge for as long as it should and the numbers of dropped calls are ridiculous!  I don't use the phone much for calls and yet it needs to be charged daily..... had I known, I wouldn't have purchased.  I have never had this bad of an experience with any so-called new phone before.  Wouldn't recommend it to anyone!  Very disappointed... I use amazon frequently and this purchase has totally turned me off!

Reviews.Title: gravity
Reviews.Author: Raynavp
Reviews.Content: I really like the keybard aspect for texting.  I'm still trying to figure out a few things like how to save phone numbers to my sim card.
